text:
Hi all, having an issue with a few nav links not linking properly after we had set-up redirects, has anyone encountered this issue?

The nav menu is set to the url, <http://blog.tormach.com|blog.tormach.com>, but on the live page it keeps redirecting to <https://cnc.tormach.com/tormach-blog/blog.tormach.com> when you click home on the nav.

I'll add more pictures in the thread.
Edit: Looks like I had a mix-up for where the nav should link to. Just diagnosed the problem wrong haha.

Hello! Is possible to use react to display the blog posts?
I am looking to use the same workflow from cms-react-boilerplate.
